data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=K-ttmz9FcFQQ7kNvgH38IvA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAVPv90VUxqhXQvTHPBMQpBaz_xMK6IW0GU0WbkeMy8ug&oe=66B4AC9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ckHK5A8fvh0Q7kNvgHN1KCX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAeZK0zqhdIlyru3I3PfoarYfPOkkk26unhrf_VfNtSrw&oe=66B4B624)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fQwyMPEQgo4Q7kNvgEXR64b&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAfl5Ep7BJhEQsfVmCU0daz3488CxC4E9-_aj6kjopsxA&oe=66B49D87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2hJLiYsKVqQQ7kNvgE9Zddn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDl-eymTfcIdufYm9SA35JVrfBFB6qoucHz8af0X4tbjg&oe=66B49066)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7LKC1UWaRY0Q7kNvgF_eSC6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD1Kvu3g-JamfNLo7EiRwuJ4-esAD2xbkpIQz5Yl0ylLg&oe=66B4BCD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SnVZUzeTO4UQ7kNvgF71YQ7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDyiFpOuEfPde2LGbKwqdRVyhXG_9MjGlxp9hXfhtyvsw&oe=66B4B959)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p7d7bAO-6tIQ7kNvgGFQbXx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAYpvP_q0eHctD5cG7c3p7DpVR_HSM8nVpZsi054yAKBw&oe=66B49F70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=L1kRzpuFZpAQ7kNvgFNiXDO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBcb9K1KHFqH5JYi4YoZUsHEVzKj0x2Ramvwbexuma5VA&oe=66B489EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p1q6hlVRgPkQ7kNvgFYKSF6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBYTl78an8lZJRr5GqzLrsq1NacXnDS0XE-UwWg3VvbZw&oe=66B49D97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=79pYAjBiAhMQ7kNvgHvf4Bv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdynYJMYY9_FaywcD79booWyLHDCXx4vfU7dyIAgHK6A&oe=66B4B90C)
